metadata.title: Owl Tony Stark Square Aviator Sunglasses Metal Frame Iron Man Vintage Glasses Spider Man Eyeglasses for Men
features: METAL SQUARE AVIATOR FRAME: Unleash your inner superhero with these trendy sunglasses that feature a metal square aviator frame inspired by the iconic Tony Stark. This frame design exudes a perfect blend of modernity and classic style, making it a must-have fashion accessory or Ironman costume piece.

POLYCARBONATED LENS: Our cosplay sunglasses are equipped with high-quality polycarbonate lenses, ensuring crystal-clear vision and superior durability. Whether you're swinging through the city or enjoying a sunny day at the beach, these lenses provide optimum visual clarity without compromising on style.

UV400 PROTECTION: Shield your eyes from harmful UV rays with the UV400 protection coating of these ironman sunglasses. This coating acts as a reliable barrier, safeguarding your eyes against UVA and UVB rays, ensuring your eyes stay safe and healthy even on the sunniest days.

COMFORTABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT: We understand that comfort is as important as style, which is why these sunglasses feature adjustable nose pieces. Achieve a personalized fit and enhanced comfort by adjusting the nose pieces according to your unique facial structure, making these glasses ideal for all-day wear.

SUITABLE FOR BOTH MEN & WOMEN: Embrace the universality of these retro sunglasses, as they are crafted to suit both men and women. The versatile unisex design allows anyone to exude confidence and style. Whether you're a fan of Ironman or Spiderman, these cool sunglasses are a must-have accessory for all superheroes in training.
description: Are you a Marvel movie fan? Say, Spider man or Iron Man? Then you're going to want a pair of these look-alike glasses. Tony Stark and Peter Parker both appear in this style of sunglasses in their films. Whether you need a pair for a cosplay or halloween costume, or a classy pair of aviators to go with every outfit - these are what you need! These are designed to be bigger for men, but will fit women as well. These sunglasses are a trusted OWL item - we pride ourselves on combining quality and affordability.
